headline: Does Rising Earnings Momentum Alter the Bull Case for Allstate (ALL)?
summary: Allstate is set to release quarterly earnings that analysts expect will show earnings per share increasing significantly from the previous year, supported by anticipated revenue growth and improved key property-liability metrics. Upward analyst revisions in earnings estimates highlight increased optimism and reflect strengthening expectations for Allstate’s financial improvements ahead of the results announcement. With analyst forecasts pointing to a substantial rise in earnings per share,...

headline: Selective Appoints Julie Parsons as Independent Director
summary: BRANCHVILLE, N.J., November 03, 2025--Selective Appoints Julie Parsons as Independent Director
